title: Lead Group Product Manager, Google Home
description: At Google, we put our users first. The world is always changing, so we need Product Managers who are continuously adapting and excited to work on products that affect millions of people every day.
key_qualifications:
Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
10 years of experience in product management or related technical role.
5 years of experience taking technical products from conception to launch.
5 years of experience in people management, with technical leadership.
Experience with Growth or Subscriptions.
preferred_qualifications:
Master's degree in a technology or business related field.
Experience in Infrastructure or Platforms.
Experience working with partners.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Ability to work in ambiguity.
responsibilities:
Oversee the portfolio, including growing existing direct to consumer subscription services, as well as efforts through third-party partnerships.
Drive subscription growth as well as technical investments to build new business models.
Partner with Product Management leads from the Home Platform and Home AI and Experiences teams to define strategy, drive growth of existing channels, and define and execute against new streams.
Manage a team of Product Managers.
